Two rival hackers accidentally shared a prime while generating RSA keys. Recover the message from ciphertext1: 4146917400289683638595373011790497051156449145710190430619747805787340176877637199861125264560676193361689919110156870508478602587239882952498359289658598, ciphertext2: 8921145685941455580004437955152171580868277891418984810445070429748843998470632024345097935940508136436127966169620802116741032063356281879992378930569032 using their public keys to exploit this slip.

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10036244598479469404421850584357547990738505464821353830564727560052326367602974865042817786803816366491845374006934025297685034672360718961746687239259521, n2=10834156928793798096305346323461187157409090857447958185922929538272203099138199378657525313485019450796470623130211191324538572828381718022401904683194127, e=4655831402233934606781611326039706439654892682493438123441044382004262474016941043176501903679355250170014906552709301776103433598830339240489850113285661

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{z9acj543}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4146917400289683638595373011790497051156449145710190430619747805787340176877637199861125264560676193361689919110156870508478602587239882952498359289658598, ciphertext2: 8921145685941455580004437955152171580868277891418984810445070429748843998470632024345097935940508136436127966169620802116741032063356281879992378930569032
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10036244598479469404421850584357547990738505464821353830564727560052326367602974865042817786803816366491845374006934025297685034672360718961746687239259521, n2=10834156928793798096305346323461187157409090857447958185922929538272203099138199378657525313485019450796470623130211191324538572828381718022401904683194127, e=4655831402233934606781611326039706439654892682493438123441044382004262474016941043176501903679355250170014906552709301776103433598830339240489850113285661
extra_info: p=90825955446742145980755501059531697283501910682371347523197692953745854073437, q=110499741501364645775356383099853304633093645783237305424436772769310756265333, r=98046898405278159049899560067561684274525023628485940229217767032776571141619, φ(n1)=10036244598479469404421850584357547990738505464821353830564727560052326367602773539345869680012060254607685989005017429741219426019413084496023630628920752, φ(n2)=10834156928793798096305346323461187157409090857447958185922929538272203099137990832017618670680194194853303208141303572655126849582728063482599817355787176
